thread.title: Garafide

author: Garafide
title: Garafide
text:
Its important to carefully vet applicants, but it is also important to be clear about your needs.
This is a fantastic website! Much of the work is done for you, and it has a great variety and worldwide reach for housesits, as well as a great selection of applicants who can care for your home, pets, etc.
I am very pleased to verify that this is a great service, for both travellers, and housesitters!
